name: Totally Fun Jigsaw Puzzles
description:
100% FREE! No puzzle packs to buy! DOWNLOAD NOW!
Thousands of beautiful jigsaw puzzles in many categories!
Take as long as you want to work on these totally free puzzles!


• Thousands of beautiful and interesting puzzles to try, in many different categories such as Animals, Architecture, Nature, and more!
• Easily mark puzzles you like as Favorites so you can work on them later from your My Favorites folder!

• Fun for all ages and skill levels!
• Play puzzles with the piece count that you like for easy relaxation or for more of a challenge - from 6 pieces up to 108 pieces on iPhone, or all the way up to 432 pieces on iPad!
• For expert players, you can play with pieces that rotate!

• Puzzle pieces automatically snap onto to the board, starting at the corners.
• Pieces snap together even before attaching them to the board, so you can build up interesting areas as you find pieces for them!

• Want an easier start? Tap the Only Edges button to show just the edge pieces so you can get the puzzle borders set up!
• Want a quick peek at the picture, just like looking at the box top? Press on the Hold For Picture button and see a full-size image underneath any pieces you've already placed.

• You can easily change the color of the background for better contrast if desired

• Some jigsaw apps use the same exact layout of pieces and shapes every time, but not here! You'll get different puzzle layouts and shapes every time for never-ending fun!

• No timers at all! Just relax and have fun!

• Your progress is automatically saved, all the time, so go ahead and take that call or jump out to any other apps - you can come back and pick up playing right where you left off!

• Sounds can be disabled if you want a quiet game
• You can even listen to your own music while you play

Thanks for playing!
